Html:
Hello,

it is possible to intergrate the Office 365 updates? They are already in the WSUS-Library but it is not possible to deploy these packages.

https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/wsus/2016/04/13/office-365-client-updates-via-wsus/


Thanks
What is the extension of the file you want to publish ?

The Update extensions seems to be .exe

But how i can download these Updatecatalog from Microsoft? Is there a catalog.xml available?

You can download these Files via WSUS, but you cant deploy it without a CM? Wow. Funny Microsoft.

So, maybee pick up the downloaded files from WSUS, and deploy it via WPP.

There are no MS download-catalog available like Adobe.
